addi $s0, $zero, 4

opcode = 001000
rs = 16
rt = 0
imm = 4

addi $s0, $zero, 0
addi $s1, $zero, 5
jal label
addi $s0, $s0, 1
beq $s0, $s1, exit
label: jr $ra
exit:

addi $s0, $zero, 1
addi $s1, $zero, 1
compara : bne $s0, $s1, label
addi $s0, $s0, 1
j compara
label:

0  - 0000 0000 - addi $s0, $zero, 0x00000001
4  - 0000 0004 - addi $s1, $zero, 0x00000001
8  - 0000 0008 - bne $s0, $s1, 0x0000002
12 - 0000 000c - addi $s0, $s0, 0x00000001
16 - 0000 0010 - j 0x00000002
20 - 0000 0014 -
